column4: Can somebody help me with this "VirtualBox kernel driver not installed. The vboxdrv kernel module was either not loaded or /dev/vboxdrv was not created for some reason. Please install the virtualbox-ose-modules package for your kernel, e.g. virtualbox-ose-modules-generic.."
- check the version of the kernel you are using as compared to the virtual box module version...
- i have found that i am running kernel 2.6.22-15-generic, and the most up to date module available is virtualbox-ose-modules-2.6.22-14-generic
